column4: Mouse / trackpad not working on Ubuntu 11.10. Used to work, just stopped working (perhaps after some updates). Up to date, just did -update and - upgrade.
probably not related, as it has worked and works on my other install (12.04 alpha)
is it not working at all?
or not the way it is supposed to
pointer not moving, clicks not taken
there was a kernel update recently was it after that?
did you have to install your own driver to make it wwork before?
cause the kernel update killed all my drivers
hmm i am sorry i dont think i can help you i have not encountered that issue
the other guys here probably could
